title: A Challenge that is not in the db
description: Do you know what day of the week this is?

title: How many numbers
description: We need to know how many numbers there are before 10, can you count them?

title: Biscuits, biscuits, biscuits!
description: There may be a lot of different types of biscuits, but which ones are the best? There's only one right answer!

title: Do you know your STEM
description: Do you know what this letter in STEM stands for?
